nameEntry.part: University of Alberta. Office of the Associate Vice-President (International Affairs)

biogHist.p: The office assists in the development of international projects and oversees their administration; provides continuing information and support services to Faculties and individuals interested in international programs; and is the first contact on campus for international agencies and visitors. Associate Vice-Presidents: 1985- Brian Llewellyn Evans.
